page.title: 12EVENTS IN MAWNAN
page.content: Throughout the year there is not a lot in quantity but the quality is extremely good. Everyone joins in enthusiastically. The year starts off with the{W.I. pantomime}which has a large cast of 70 including husbands and children, it is always funny with good dancing and singing. An old tradition is{cockling}on Good Friday at Helford Passage . The Summer {carnival}is full of floats and walkers. It is led by the local queen. The men of the Red Lion form a band playing anything they can get hold of. There is a Church show and sale . Jumble sales and coffee mornings are held in aid of local clubs etc. The {school}has an Easter festival with egg rolling, hat making and folk dancing. Later in the year there is a music evening. At Christmas the school produce a pantomime.
